info.description: User Management API with JWT Authentication
info.title: User Management API

get.description: Get all apps in the system (Admin privileges required)
Get all boxes in the system (Admin privileges required)
Get all campaigns in the system (Admin privileges required)
Get all flows in the system (Admin privileges required)
Get all profiles in the system (Admin privileges required)

post.description: Register a new user account with username and password (Admin privileges required)

get.description: Get list of all users in the system with pagination and search (Admin privileges required)

parameters.description: Number of items per page (default: 10, max: 100)
parameters.name: limit

delete.description: Delete a user account (Admin privileges required)

put.description: Set the active status of a user account (Admin privileges required)

get.description: Get all profiles for a specific app (user must own the app) with pagination

parameters.description: Number of items per page (default: 20, max: 100)
parameters.name: limit

get.description: Get all apps belonging to the authenticated user

post.description: Create a new anti-detect browser app for the authenticated user

get.description: Get a specific app by ID (user must own it)

put.description: Update an app (user must own it)

delete.description: Delete an app (user must own it)

post.description: Authenticate user with username and password
Logout the current user (revoke refresh token)

get.description: Get current user profile information

post.description: Refresh access token using refresh token

get.description: Get all apps for a specific box (user must own the box)
Get all boxes belonging to the authenticated user with pagination

parameters.description: Number of items per page (default: 20, max: 100)
parameters.name: limit

post.description: Create a new box for the authenticated user
Sync all boxes and their profiles for the authenticated user
post.summary: Sync all boxes for the authenticated user

get.description: Get a specific box by ID (user must own it)

put.description: Update a box (user must own it). Can update both name and user_id. If user_id is provided, it must be a valid user ID.

parameters.description: Update box request - name is required, user_id is optional
parameters.name: request

delete.description: Delete a box (user must own it)

post.description: Sync all profiles from a specific box's Hidemium instance via tunnel
post.summary: Sync profiles from box's Hidemium instance

get.description: Get all flows for a specific campaign (user must own the campaign) with pagination

parameters.description: Number of items per page (default: 20, max: 100)
parameters.name: limit

get.description: Get all campaigns belonging to the authenticated user

post.description: Create a new campaign for the authenticated user

get.description: Get a specific campaign by ID (user must own it)

put.description: Update a campaign (user must own it)

delete.description: Delete a campaign (user must own it)

get.description: Get all group campaigns for a specific campaign
get.summary: Get all group campaigns for a campaign

get.description: Get all flows belonging to the authenticated user with pagination

parameters.description: Number of items per page (default: 20, max: 100)
parameters.name: limit

post.description: Create a new flow for the authenticated user

get.description: Get all flows for a specific status (user must own them) with pagination

parameters.description: Number of items per page (default: 20, max: 100)
parameters.name: limit

get.description: Get a specific flow by ID (user must own it)

put.description: Update a flow (user must own it)

delete.description: Delete a flow (user must own it)

get.description: Get all flows for a specific group campaign (user must own the campaign) with pagination

parameters.description: Number of items per page (default: 20, max: 100)
parameters.name: limit

get.description: Get a specific group campaign by its ID
get.summary: Get a group campaign by ID

get.description: Get statistics for a specific group campaign
Get profiles from Genlogin platform
Get profiles from Hidemium platform
Get all available platform routes and endpoints
Get list of supported platforms
Get information about a specific platform endpoint
Get the full URL for a specific platform endpoint
Get all flows for a specific profile (user must own the profile) with pagination

parameters.description: Number of items per page (default: 20, max: 100)
parameters.name: limit

get.description: Get all profiles for a specific box (user must own the box) with pagination

parameters.description: Number of items per page (default: 20, max: 100)
parameters.name: limit

post.description: Create a new browser profile for the authenticated user. Profile data is required and must contain configuration from anti-detect browser.

parameters.description: Create profile request (data field is required)
parameters.name: request

get.description: Get a specific profile by ID (user must own it)

put.description: Update a profile (user must own it)

delete.description: Delete a profile (user must own it)

data.description: Store complex profile data from anti-detect browsers

message.example: Sync completed: 4/5 boxes synced, 50 profiles processed

BearerAuth.description: Enter `Bearer ` followed by your JWT token (e.g. "Bearer <token>")
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
